page.title: 14Cuxton Metals
page.content: Cuxton Metals is a small business by the River Medway near Cuxton Station. It sells a variety of non-ferrous metals such as brass, bronze, copper and aluminium. The business is run by two ladies and they sell 200 kg. a day. Aluminium which is the most sought after metal is used for boilers. Copper is used for pipes and brass for hooks. They have 2 machines, a saw and some scales. As they have no fork-lift truck they move the metal by hand. Most of the metals come from abroad. Copper costs Â£1.90 per kg., brass Â£5.45 per kg., bronze Â£4.40 per kg. and aluminium Â£1.90 per kg. They try to stock as many different kinds of metals as possible. The metals are distributed all over Kent. Recently the ladies entered a competition for small businesses and came second.
